alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:00AM MST until February 17 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Carbon County including Shirley Basin and Muddy Gap. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
